description: This file defines a Flutter widget called BookCard, which displays a book cover along with metadata such as title, author, rating, and price. It includes interactive visual effects on focus and press, and features for toggling wishlist status and actions like CTA buttons.

classes.name: BookCard
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that visually represents a book with cover image, title, author, rating, price, and interactive feedback effects.

classes.name: _CornerRibbon
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays a diagonal corner ribbon label on a book cover with customizable text and color.

methods.name: _formatPrice
methods.description: Formats a price in cents into a currency string, prefixed with the rupee symbol, for display.
